channel.title: Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation

item.title: Container Images
item.description: Overview The following provides a high level overview of each of the container images. CentOS vs Red Hat UBI Images The Crunchy Container suite provides three different OS images: centos7, ubi7, and ubi8-minimal. Both images utilize Crunchy Ceritifed RPM’s for the installation of PostgreSQL, and outside of the base images utilized to build the containers and any packages included within them (either CentOS or UBI), both are effectively the same.

item.title: Supported Platforms
item.description: Supported Platforms Crunchy Container Suite supports the following platforms: Docker 1.13+ Kubernetes 1.12+ OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 VMWare Enterprise PKS 1.3+
